tool.name: Join +/- Ions
tool.description: Join positive and negative ionization-mode W4M datasets for the same samples
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/w4mjoinpn.sh dmneg $dmneg dmpos $dmpos dmout $dmout smneg $smneg smpos $smpos smout $smout vmneg $vmneg vmpos $vmpos vmout $vmout

param.name: dmpos
param.label: Data matrix positive
param.help: Positive ionization-mode: Features x samples (tabular data - decimal: '.'; missing: NA; mode: numerical; separator: tab character)

param.name: smpos
param.label: Sample metadata positive
param.help: Positive ionization-mode: Samples x metadata (tabular data - decimal: '.'; missing: NA; mode: character or numerical; separator: tab character)

param.name: vmpos
param.label: Variable metadata positive
param.help: Positive ionization-mode: Features x metadata (tabular data - decimal: '.'; missing: NA; mode: character or numerical; separator: tab character)

param.name: dmneg
param.label: Data matrix negative
param.help: Negative ionization-mode: Features x samples (tabular data - decimal: '.'; missing: NA; mode: numerical; separator: tab character)

param.name: smneg
param.label: Sample metadata negative
param.help: Negative ionization-mode: Samples x metadata (tabular data - decimal: '.'; missing: NA; mode: character or numerical; separator: tab character)

param.name: vmneg
param.label: Variable metadata negative
param.help: Negative ionization-mode: Features x metadata (tabular data - decimal: '.'; missing: NA; mode: character or numerical; separator: tab character)
